name: cws
description: Unified IO Backend combining CrossWord backend, dependencies, and main server functionality

scripts.start:with-env: cross-env SOCKET_IO_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=all SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_PRIVATE_NETWORK_ORIGINS=true SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_UNKNOWN_ORIGIN_WITH_AIRPAD_AUTH=true CWS_TUNNEL_DEBUG=true CWS_UPSTREAM_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=false tsx server/index.ts
scripts.start:with-env:watch: cross-env SOCKET_IO_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=all SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_PRIVATE_NETWORK_ORIGINS=true SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_UNKNOWN_ORIGIN_WITH_AIRPAD_AUTH=true CWS_TUNNEL_DEBUG=true CWS_UPSTREAM_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=false tsx watch server/index.ts
scripts.start:fastify: cross-env SOCKET_IO_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=all SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_PRIVATE_NETWORK_ORIGINS=true SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_UNKNOWN_ORIGIN_WITH_AIRPAD_AUTH=true CWS_TUNNEL_DEBUG=true CWS_UPSTREAM_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=false tsx server/fastify-server.ts
scripts.start:fastify:watch: cross-env SOCKET_IO_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=all SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_PRIVATE_NETWORK_ORIGINS=true SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_UNKNOWN_ORIGIN_WITH_AIRPAD_AUTH=true CWS_TUNNEL_DEBUG=true CWS_UPSTREAM_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=false tsx watch server/fastify-server.ts
scripts.dev:with-env: cross-env SOCKET_IO_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=all SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_PRIVATE_NETWORK_ORIGINS=true SOCKET_IO_ALLOW_UNKNOWN_ORIGIN_WITH_AIRPAD_AUTH=true CWS_TUNNEL_DEBUG=true CWS_UPSTREAM_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=false tsx server/index.ts
scripts.test:integration: echo "Integration tests not yet configured" && exit 0
